Use sandals-like footwear: Sandals or similar open-toed footwear can be a practical solution for walking on various surfaces.
Wear water shoes: Water shoes are designed to provide grip and protection in wet environments.
Use shoe covers: Shoe covers can be a temporary solution to protect your feet from dirt and debris.
Wear slippers: Slippers can be a comfortable and convenient option for indoor use.
Use foot protection devices: Devices like foot guards or foot protectors can be used to shield your feet from sharp objects or rough surfaces.
